name: Graveyard Shift (itch) (TikiTiki)
description:
You were slacking off the whole night and now you only have 1 minute to harvest the souls in the graveyard before sunrise happens and they escape the cemetery!

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move

Use Space or Mouse Click to harvest

Press Escape to Quit Game

Made for the Ludum Dare 52 and completed within 52 hours! The theme was "Harvest".

All the graphics and audio were made by me.
